Package com.davidsoergel.stats

Interface Summary
ContinuousDistribution A multi-dimensional distribution over a continuous real space.
ContinuousDistribution1D A one-dimensional continuous distribution on the real number line.
DiscreteDistribution1D A one-dimensional continuous distribution on the integer number line.
DissimilarityMeasure<T> A measure of dissimilarity between points of the generic type.
DistanceMetric<T> A dissimilarity measure that is also a distance in an inner product space, i.e.
DistributionProcessor<T extends MutableDistribution> An operator that performs some transformation on a distribution of the generic type.
DoubleArrayContainer A distribution that can be represented as an array of double.
IntArrayContainer A distribution that can be represented as an array of int.
MutableDistribution Marker interface for classes that represent distributions of some kind, and that can be altered.
ProbabilisticDissimilarityMeasure<T>  
RequiresPreparationDistanceMetric<T>  
SimpleFunction A function from the reals onto the reals.
Statistic<T> Interface for classes that can compute a double value given an object of the generic type.
 

Class Summary
BinnedXYSeries Provides distributions of y values within x bins.
DistributionXYSeries Stores a set of y values for each x value, allowing computation of mean, standard deviation, and quantiles for each x.
DoubleArrayLinearScaler Normalize the array so that the values sum to one.
DoubleArrayNormalizer Normalize the array so that the values sum to one.
DoubleArraySquareNormalizer Normalize the array so that the length of the vector is one (i.e., the squares of the values sum to one).
DoubleArrayZscoreScaler Normalize the array so that the values sum to one.

KernelDensityFunctionSampler Given a scatterplot and an x value, sample from the distribution of Y values in a column of a given width above the given x.
